Goal Representation:
Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Cook the chicken and pasta.', '2. Combine the chicken and pasta.', '3. Put the chicken pasta on
 a plate.']

behavior cook_chicken(chicken:item, stove:item, pot:item):
    body:
        achieve plugged(stove)
        achieve is_on(stove)
        achieve inside(chicken, pot)
        boil_vegetables_in_pot_on_stove(stove, pot)
        # Assuming the chicken needs to be boiled for cooking

behavior cook_pasta(dry_pasta:item, stove:item, pot:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(dry_pasta, pot)
        boil_vegetables_in_pot_on_stove(stove, pot)
        # Assuming the pasta also needs to be boiled, utilizing the same method

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind chicken: item where:
            is_food_chicken(chicken)
        # Select chicken

        bind dry_pasta: item where:
            is_dry_pasta(dry_pasta)
        # Select dry pasta

        bind stove: item where:
            is_stove(stove)
        # Select stove

        bind pot: item where:
            is_pot(pot) and close(pot, stove)
        # Select a pot close to the stove

        cook_chicken(chicken, stove, pot)
        cook_pasta(dry_pasta, stove, pot)

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Cook the chicken pasta.', '2. Put the chicken pasta on a plate.']

behavior cook_chicken_pasta(chicken:item, pasta:item, stove:item, pot:item, pan:item):
    body:
        # Ensure the pot has water, and it is on the stove
        achieve has_water(pot)
        achieve close(pot, stove)

        # Ensure the stove is turned on to boil the pasta
        achieve is_on(stove)

        # Put the pasta into the boiling water in the pot
        achieve inside(pasta, pot)

        # Ensure the pan is close to the stove to cook the chicken
        achieve close(pan, stove)

        # Ensure the chicken is cooked in the pan on the stove
        achieve inside(chicken, pan)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind chicken: item where:
            is_food_chicken(chicken)
        # Select a chicken item to be cooked

        bind pasta: item where:
            is_dry_pasta(pasta)
        # Select dry pasta to be cooked

        bind stove: item where:
            is_stove(stove)
        # Select the stove for cooking

        bind pot: item where:
            is_pot(pot)
        # Select a pot to boil the pasta

        bind pan: item where:
            is_fryingpan(pan)
        # Select a pan to cook the chicken

        cook_chicken_pasta(chicken, pasta, stove, pot, pan)

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Cook the chicken and pasta together.', '2. Put the cooked chicken pasta on a plate.']

behavior cook_chicken_and_pasta(pot:item, stove:item, chicken:item, pasta:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(chicken, pot) 
        achieve inside(pasta, pot) 
        achieve on(pot, stove) 
        achieve is_on(stove) 

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind stove: item where:
            is_stove(stove)
        # Select stove
  
        bind pot: item where:
            is_pot(pot)
        # Select pot
        
        bind chicken: item where:
            is_food_chicken(chicken)
        # Select chicken
        
        bind pasta: item where:
            is_dry_pasta(pasta)
        # Select dry pasta
        
        cook_chicken_and_pasta(pot, stove, chicken, pasta)
        # Cook chicken and pasta together

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Cook the chicken pasta.', '2. Put the chicken pasta on a plate.']

def has_chicken_pasta_ingredients(pot:item):
    # Function to check if the pot has chicken and pasta inside it
    symbol has_chicken_pasta=exists o: item : (is_food_chicken(o) or is_dry_pasta(o)) and inside(o, 
pot)
    return has_chicken_pasta

behavior cook_chicken_pasta(stove:item, pot:item):
    body:
        achieve is_on(stove) # Turn the stove on
        achieve inside(pot, stove) # Place the pot on the stove
        # Boil the chicken and pasta in the pot on the stove
        boil_vegetables_in_pot_on_stove(stove, pot)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind stove: item where:
            is_stove(stove)
        # Select a stove
        
        bind pot: item where:
            is_pot(pot) and has_chicken_pasta_ingredients(pot)
        # Select a pot that contains chicken and pasta
        
        cook_chicken_pasta(stove, pot) # Cook the chicken pasta
